search.query: | mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name=kafka_partition.LogEndOffset OR metric_name=kafka_partition.LogStartOffset OR metric_name=kafka_partition.NumLogSegments OR metric_name=kafka_partition.Size OR metric_name=kafka_partition.UnderReplicatedPartitions env="$env$" label="$label$" topic="$topic$" by env, label, jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition, metric_name | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_partition.*) as "*" by env, label, jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition | fields env, label, jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition, LogStartOffset, LogEndOffset, NumLogSegments, Size, UnderReplicatedPartitions | stats dc(partition) as partition, dc(jolokia_agent_url) as brokers, sum(UnderReplicatedPartitions) as UnderReplicatedPartitions, sum(Size) as Size | eval UnderReplicatedPartitions=round(UnderReplicatedPartitions/partition*100, 2), Size=round(Size/1024/1024, 3) | rename partition as "Numbers of Partitions", brokers as "Total Number of Brokers", UnderReplicatedPartitions as "Under-replicated %", Size as "Size (MB)" | transpose | eval summary = column . ": " . 'row 1' | fields summary

| mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name=kafka_partition.UnderReplicatedPartitions env="$env$" label="$label$" topic="$topic$" by env, label, jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition, metric_name | stats dc(partition) as "# of Partitions", values(partition) as "Partitions" by jolokia_agent_url, topic | mvexpand Partitions | sort limit=0 Partitions | eventstats count('# of Partitions') as "# of Partitions" by jolokia_agent_url | stats first(*) as "*", list(Partitions) as Partitions by jolokia_agent_url | mvcombine Partitions | rex field=Partitions mode=sed "s/ /,/g" | eval Partitions = "(" . Partitions . ")" | rex field=jolokia_agent_url "//(?<Broker>[^:]*)\:" | fields Broker, "# of Partitions", Partitions

| mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name="kafka_topic.MessagesInPerSec.MeanRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.MessagesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.MessagesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.MessagesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesInPerSec.MeanRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesOutPerSec.MeanRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesOutPerSec.OneMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesOutPerSec.FiveMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesOutPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesRejectedPerSec.MeanRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesRejectedPerSec.OneMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesRejectedPerSec.FiveMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.BytesRejectedPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.MeanRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.MeanRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate" OR metric_name="kafka_topic.FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate" env="$env$" label="$label$" topic="$topic$" by metric_name, jolokia_agent_url span=1m | rex field=metric_name "[^\.]*\.(?<rate>[^\.]*)\." | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_topic.*) as "*" by _time, rate, jolokia_agent_url | eval Mean=case(isnotnull('FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.MeanRate'), 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.MeanRate'), 'FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('BytesRejectedPerSec.MeanRate'), 'BytesRejectedPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('BytesInPerSec.MeanRate'), 'BytesInPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('BytesOutPerSec.MeanRate'), 'BytesOutPerSec.MeanRate', isnotnull('MessagesInPerSec.MeanRate'), 'MessagesInPerSec.MeanRate') | eval 1min=case(isnotnull('FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesRejectedPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'BytesRejectedPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'BytesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesOutPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'BytesOutPerSec.OneMinuteRate', isnotnull('MessagesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate'), 'MessagesInPerSec.OneMinuteRate') | eval 5min=case(isnotnull('FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesRejectedPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'BytesRejectedPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'BytesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesOutPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'BytesOutPerSec.FiveMinuteRate', isnotnull('MessagesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate'), 'MessagesInPerSec.FiveMinuteRate') | eval 15min=case(isnotnull('FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'FailedFetchRequestsPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesRejectedPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'BytesRejectedPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'BytesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('BytesOutPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'BytesOutPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate', isnotnull('MessagesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate'), 'MessagesInPerSec.FifteenMinuteRate') | fields rate, jolokia_agent_url, Mean, 1min, 5min, 15min | foreach Mean, 1min, 5min, 15min [ eval "<<FIELD>>" = if(rate="BytesInPerSec" OR rate="BytesOutPerSec", round('<<FIELD>>'/1024, 2), '<<FIELD>>') ] | stats sparkline(avg(Mean),) As sparkline, avg(*) as "*" by rate | fields rate, sparkline, Mean, 1min, 5min, 15min | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/BytesInPerSec/KBytesInPerSec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/BytesOutPerSec/KBytesOutPerSec/g" | eval order=case(rate="MessagesInPerSec", 0, rate="KBytesInPerSec", 1, rate="KBytesOutPerSec", 2, rate="BytesRejectedPerSec", 3, rate="FailedFetchRequestsPerSec", 4, rate="FailedProduceRequestsPerSec", 5) | sort order | fields - order | foreach Mean, 1min, 5min, 15min [ eval "<<FIELD>>" = round('<<FIELD>>', 2) ] | rename 1min as "1 min", 5min as "5 min", 15min as "15 min" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/MessagesInPerSec/Messages in \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/KBytesInPerSec/KBytes in \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/KBytesOutPerSec/KBytes out \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/BytesRejectedPerSec/Bytes rejected \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/FailedFetchRequestsPerSec/Failed fetch request \/sec/g" | rex field=rate mode=sed "s/FailedProduceRequestsPerSec/Failed produce request \/sec/g" | rename rate as Rate

| mstats latest(_value) as value where `telegraf_kafka_index` metric_name=kafka_partition.LogEndOffset OR metric_name=kafka_partition.LogStartOffset OR metric_name=kafka_partition.NumLogSegments OR metric_name=kafka_partition.Size OR metric_name=kafka_partition.UnderReplicatedPartitions env="$env$" label="$label$" topic="$topic$" by jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition, metric_name | eval {metric_name}=value | stats first(kafka_partition.*) as "*" by jolokia_agent_url, topic, partition | stats max(LogEndOffset) as LogEndOffset, sum(Size) as Size, sum(UnderReplicatedPartitions) as UnderReplicatedPartitions by partition | sort limit=0 partition | eval UnderReplicatedPartitions=if(UnderReplicatedPartitions>0, "true", "false") | eval Size=round(Size/1024/1024, 3) | rename partition as Partition, LogEndOffset as "Latest Offset", UnderReplicatedPartitions as "Under Replicated?", Size as "Size (MB)"
